feature.label: ERMaster-NHIT
feature.description: ERMaster is GUI editor for ER diagram. It is operated as Eclipse plug-in. Making ER diagram, the print of ER diagram, and the DDL output from ER diagram, etc. can be done graphical. Moreover, import from DB, the group management, and the historical management, etc. are supported.
